multi_add_portrait;Duessel;MidLeft;Kyle;MidRight;Forde;FarRight
speak;Duessel;Thank you both for accompanying me today.|Prince Ephraim speaks highly of your abilities.
speak;Kyle;It's an honor to serve alongside you, General Duessel.|Your reputation precedes you.
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;Yeah, although I didn't expect "rebuilding village houses"|would be part of our duties today.
speak;Duessel;A knight's duty extends beyond the battlefield.|The people of this village have suffered enough.
speak;Kyle;Agreed.|And it gives us something productive to do while waiting for our ship to Grado.
speak;Duessel;That reminds me...|How do you two feel about heading to Grado?|It must be strange, given recent events.
expression;Forde;NormalBlink
speak;Forde;I'm just following Prince Ephraim's orders.|Though I am curious to see the homeland of our former enemies.
speak;Kyle;Actually, for me it's a bit different.|My grandfather was from Grado originally.
bop_portrait;Forde
speak;Forde;What?|You never told me that!
speak;Kyle;It never came up.|He was a wyvern knight in service to the Grado Empire before settling in Renais.
speak;Duessel;A wyvern knight, you say?|What was his name?
speak;Kyle;Riordan.|Riordan Vernais.|He served about forty years ago.
speak;Duessel;Riordan Vernais...|Wait!|I knew him!|Not well, but I certainly knew of him.
speak;Kyle;You...you knew my grandfather?
speak;Duessel;Indeed.|I was just a young soldier when he was serving.|He was part of the Eastern Aerial Guard, if I recall correctly.
speak;Kyle;Yes, that's right!|This is...unexpected.|He wasn't a high-ranking officer or anything special.
speak;Duessel;Perhaps not in rank, but he was known for his skill.|There was an incident with bandits near the border...|He saved an entire village with just two other knights.
speak;Duessel;I remember because they had us study the tactics they used.|Your grandfather had a reputation as a clever strategist.
expression;Kyle;Smile
speak;Kyle;I...had no idea.|He rarely spoke of his time in Grado's service.|I only know he left after meeting my grandmother in Renais.
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;Well, this is quite the revelation!|All these years training together, and I never knew my stern partner had Grado blood!
bop_portrait;Forde
speak;Forde;Suddenly your obsession with proper technique makes more sense.|That famous Grado military discipline!
expression;Kyle;NoSmile
speak;Kyle;I'm not obsessed with technique, I'm just thorough.|And my discipline comes from training, not bloodlines.
expression;Duessel;Smile
speak;Duessel;Your grandfather would be proud to see you now, Kyle.|A knight of Renais, upholding the values of both nations.
speak;Kyle;Thank you, General.|That...means a lot coming from you.
bop_portrait;Forde
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;No wonder you have such a way with wyverns!
speak;Kyle;Yes, they have come pretty naturally to me.
speak;Duessel;When we reach Grado, I could arrange for you to see the training grounds.|That's where your grandfather would have trained.|Some of the old records might still mention him.
expression;Kyle;Smile
speak;Kyle;I would appreciate that very much, General Duessel.|It would be an honor.
speak;Forde;Well, now I'm doubly intrigued about our journey to Grado!|Family history and rebuilding a nation!
speak;Duessel;For now, though, we have houses to rebuild.|Let's get back to work, shall we?
speak;Kyle;Of course.|Let's make Prince Ephraim proud.
speak;Forde;Right behind you...|Though I still think my talents are better used with a brush than a hammer.
